subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: When was the capital of Rajasthan shifted from Jaipur to Ajmer?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी जैसेना से जयपुर तक कब बदल गई?
explanation_en:
The capital of Rajasthan was shifted from Jaipur to Ajmer in 1929.

English Explanation: The capital of Rajasthan was shifted from Jaipur to Ajmer in 1929.
